commit message: Add license for Content Provider code

Ensure the build fails if there is no customized dropbox.xml.

rename : src/main/res/values/no-dropbox.xml => src/cloudless/res/values/no-dropbox.xml
Add Git rev to apk name and to version number

Add commit date in deploy directory
Add flag for checking deprecation warnings

Update strings.xml

Renamed 'Tag' to 'Kategorie', which can be otherwise confused with 'Day' in German, additional corrections
Don't show create date in simple widget. Fixes #123.

Make sort of tags, lists and filters a setting

Sorting is an UI concern so it should not be a parameter to core data
structures.
Fix issue with list and tag drawer display.
Include rev and date in filename on deploy
Expose parse tokens in Javascript in tokens global var
Also give access to the full task object from Javascript
Use a single property to enable all Xlint options and document deploy tasks
Added batch file to attach jdb for CLI debugging

Main listview shoild fill parent view
